projects.name: Web Platform for Educational Offerings in Chiapas
projects.Project_Overview: This project aimed to create a centralized web platform to help students in Chiapas explore university programs with ease. The platform provides a structured database with detailed information on degree programs, admission requirements, costs, and institutional details. It offers intuitive search and filtering options, allowing students to compare different programs efficiently. Additionally, the platform enhances accessibility by enabling students to download academic plans and set reminders for key enrollment deadlines.
projects.description: Development of a web platform for students to search and explore university programs in Chiapas, providing a centralized source of detailed information on degrees, admission criteria, and costs. The platform includes key features for students such as search and filtering options, program details, admission requirements, cost breakdowns, and contact information.
responsibilities: Design and implement the user interface using React with Vite.
Develop secure RESTful APIs with PHP CodeIgniter 4, including password hash mechanisms and protected routes.
Design scalable endpoints to handle public statistics and administrative operations.
Implement pagination in the endpoints to optimize performance with over 1,000 universities.
Ensure data standardization to enable effective comparison of educational programs.
Implement tools for students to download academic plans and institutional profiles in PDF format.
Develop features for students to set reminders for important dates such as enrollment deadlines and exams.
achievements: Significant reduction in system response time thanks to pagination.
Improved accessibility of educational information for students in Chiapas.
Successful implementation of a centralized platform, reducing the time students spend searching for educational opportunities.
Increased student awareness of the range of educational options available in Chiapas.
Development of an intuitive system allowing students to compare educational programs side-by-side, aiding informed decision-making.

projects.name: Administrative System for University Programs
projects.Project_Overview: This system was developed to help university administrators manage academic program data more efficiently. It allows the creation, modification, and deletion of institution and program-related information while also facilitating the generation of statistical reports. The system enhances administrative workflows by providing an intuitive interface for non-technical users, ensuring data accuracy, and promoting engagement between institutions and prospective students.
projects.description: The administrative module was designed for administrators to manage university data, including creating, modifying, and deleting information related to institutions, programs, and other relevant data. This system also facilitates the generation of general usage statistics, ensuring effective data management.
responsibilities: Backend development using CodeIgniter 4 with MVC architecture.
Designing the admin interface with Bootstrap for a responsive and accessible layout.
Creating secure RESTful APIs for data insertion and retrieval.

The module 'Web Platform for Educational Offerings in Chiapas' made with React was integrated into the CodeIgniter project, functioning only as a pre-built view, making use of both Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS within the same project.
Developing a system for generating general usage statistics.
Implementing functionalities for administrators to manage academic programs, promotions, and updates.
Ensuring the accuracy and timely updates of educational data within the platform.
Monitoring key performance metrics and gathering user feedback to improve platform usability.
achievements: An efficient and secure system streamlining administrative tasks for university staff.
An intuitive interface that facilitated interaction for non-technical users.
A platform allowing institutions to easily manage their academic programs, promotions, and updates, reducing reliance on manual processes.
A system that allows administrators to generate reports displaying the number of visits to each university within the system.
A centralized system for managing data to ensure information is current, contributing to the reduction of academic lag in Chiapas.
Enhanced institutional engagement, with universities actively updating and maintaining their program information.
A significant increase in platform adoption and student usage, improving access to education-related data.

projects.name: Landing Page for Chiapas Events - Anytime Fitness Tuxtla
projects.Project_Overview: This project consisted of the design and implementation of a promotional landing page for Chiapas Events, developed for the company Anytime Fitness Tuxtla. The landing page was created to promote cultural, recreational, and sports events in the region, providing an attractive and modern interface for visitors.
projects.description: Development of a responsive landing page to showcase upcoming events in Chiapas. The site highlights event categories, advantages of participation, and includes a multimedia gallery. It was built with attention to visual design and user experience, ensuring accessibility across devices.
responsibilities: Design the structure and layout of the landing page based on the corporate branding.
Implement responsive design to ensure compatibility across desktop and mobile devices.
Integrate interactive components including carousel for featured events and animated transitions.
Optimize image assets for fast loading and better performance.
Implement modular and reusable UI components using Tailwind CSS and ShadCN/UI.
Coordinate with the client to adapt the site content to their communication objectives.
achievements: Successful launch of a visually appealing and functional landing page.
Improved brand visibility for Anytime Fitness Tuxtla through online event promotion.
Responsive interface that adapts seamlessly to different devices.
Positive feedback from users due to its simplicity and ease of navigation.

projects.name: AMIFIT Cobro App
projects.Project_Overview: This project focused on the development of a payment management web application for Anytime Fitness Tuxtla. The application enables gym members to pay their monthly fees, register passes, and purchase keyfobs through a secure online interface. It integrates Stripe for payment processing, supports QR code payment flows, and provides a responsive user interface tailored for mobile and desktop use.
projects.description: Development of a responsive payment application for Anytime Fitness members in Tuxtla. The platform allows users to register, pay monthly subscriptions, and handle keyfob purchases. Built with React and Stripe integration, it features a modular architecture and reusable components to simplify future maintenance and scaling.
responsibilities: Design and implement payment workflows for monthly fees, passes, and keyfobs.
Integrate Stripe API for secure and reliable payment processing.
Implement QR code generation and scanning flow for user-friendly payment experience.
Develop modular UI components such as CardQR, SocioInfo, and Payment Summaries.
Refactor and maintain API endpoints for keyfob and monthly payment validation.
Ensure responsive and accessible interface across devices.
achievements: Successful integration of Stripe with QR-based payment flow.
Deployment of a fully functional payment application in less than a week.
Improved efficiency in gym membership fee collection.
Simplified keyfob management and reduced administrative overhead.

projects.name: AMIFIT App
projects.Project_Overview: This project delivers a membership and payment management system for Anytime Fitness Tuxtla. It centralizes keyfob sales, monthly fee payments, and inventory handling, integrating Stripe for online payments and email notifications for purchase confirmations. The backend is built on CodeIgniter 4 with structured controllers, models, and routes to ensure secure, maintainable operations.
projects.description: Development of a CodeIgniter 4 application to manage member operations: validating keys, processing monthly payments, handling standby payments during closures, and sending purchase confirmations. The interface uses Bootstrap for responsive views and supports Stripe payment links with verification and cancellation endpoints.
responsibilities: Implement Stripe payment flow: start, verify, and cancel payment endpoints.
Build MensualidadController for monthly fee validation, purchase, and email notifications.
Add PagosStandby model and logic to handle payments during gym closures.
Create keyfob routes and controllers with inventory validation and decrement.
Standardize JSON responses, error handling, and CORS headers.
Configure environment variables and refactor models for clarity and maintainability.
achievements: Stripe integration with dynamic product concepts and standby handling.
Inventory support for multiple product types (KeyFob, Towels, Cord).
Automated PHPMailer confirmations for purchases.
Consistent API responses and improved developer ergonomics.

projects.name: AEROBALAM
projects.Project_Overview: This project consisted of developing a flight management and booking platform called AEROBALAM. It provides an administration dashboard for managing users, destinations, coupons, and flight schedules. The system includes a calendar view for flights, user management with roles, and coupon management with activation and deactivation features.
projects.description: Development of a CodeIgniter 4 web application for flight operations. The platform enables administrators to manage destinations, user accounts, coupons, and flight schedules. Integrated FullCalendar for flight scheduling, DataTables for user and destination management, and SweetAlert for enhanced user feedback. Bootstrap was applied to ensure responsive UI components.
responsibilities: Implement flight calendar using FullCalendar with schedule and passenger detail views.
Develop user management system with DataTables integration and CRUD features.
Build destinations management module with create, edit, activate, and deactivate options.
Integrate coupon management system with validation, activation, and deactivation flows.
Enhance dashboard UI with Bootstrap and interactive modals.
Configure controllers, models, and routes for clean API responses.
achievements: Successful integration of flight calendar with real-time event details.
Full CRUD support for users, destinations, and coupons.
Improved administrator efficiency with responsive dashboard tools.
Deployed a functional flight booking management platform in one week.
